reviewText: Interesting book, mostly common sense, with some sound suggestions for improving ourselves.  I keep it handy to remind myself of these suggestions.
Great material, well presented. Material like this taken up by mass media would make dementia extinct.
I love watching any of the PBS programs with Dr. Amen. He presents his information in such a way that you can relate and understand how important it is to treat your mind with respect.

Some good info. Didn't feel I could watch with my little ones around with some of the language I personally didn't appreciate (many "OM_") and two of the stories he tells were not quite G rated either. I am thinking of trying some of his more recent stuff to see if it has less of what I don't appreciate.
